title: Eyes On Always
author: VD
content_html:
Pretending that danger doesn’t exist doesn’t actually make it go away.

Also, it might be worth noting that carrying a lighter while filling up gives one an effective weapon in extremis.

At least no one can call him racist. And isn’t that the truly important thing here?
